alert.note: Alert for Mountains Of San Benito County And Interior Monterey County Including Pinnacles National Park; North Bay Interior Valleys; Southern Salinas Valley, Arroyo Seco and Lake San Antonio (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued December 10 at 7:21AM PST until December 10 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Temperatures as low as 36 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...North Bay Interior Valleys, Southern Salinas Valley, Arroyo Seco, and Lake San Antonio and Mountains of San Benito and Interior Monterey County including Pinnacles National Park. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: Mountains Of San Benito County And Interior Monterey County Including Pinnacles National Park; North Bay Interior Valleys; Southern Salinas Valley, Arroyo Seco and Lake San Antonio
